data.title: Colors in Korean
data.meta_description: In this free lesson, you'll learn the Korean words for common colors. Orange is 주황색 - juhwangsaek, yellow is 노란색 - noransaek... learn more here!
data.text:
In this free lesson you'll learn the Korean words for common colors. You’ll be surprised how often you use color words to describe things on a daily basis, especially if you enjoy shopping! You can start new conversations too by talking about your favorite color.

Here are some common colors in Korean to get you started!

Orange - 주황색 - juhwangsaek

Yellow - 노란색 - noransaek

Blue - 파란색 - paransaek

Red - 빨간색 - bbalgansaek

Green - 초록색 - choroksaek

Black - 검정색 - geomjeongsaek

Brown - 갈색 - galsaek

Pink - 분홍색 - bunhongsaek

Purple - 보라색 - borasaek

White - 흰색 - heuinsaek

After this lesson you’ll be a master of the colors in Korean!

Resources for further reading:

Practice Your Pronunciation With Rocket Record

Rocket Record lets you perfect your Korean pronunciation. Just listen to the native speaker audio and then use the microphone icon to record yourself. Once you’re done, you’ll get a score out of 100 on your pronunciation and can listen to your own audio playback. (Use a headset mic for best results.) Problems? Click here!
